meanings.definition: To record or enter in a register.
meanings.sent1: I will enregister your name in the attendance list.
meanings.sent2: Please enregister your personal details at the front desk.
meanings.sent3: The diligent clerk decided to enregister every single transaction.
meanings.sent4: Her memory enregisters every detail of that special day.
meanings.sent5: The old book enregisters the history of our ancestors.

meanings.sent1: The librarian will enregister the new books in the system.
meanings.sent2: It is important to enregister important events for future reference.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to enregister its playful antics.
meanings.sent4: His mind enregisters every word of wisdom shared by his grandfather.
meanings.sent5: The camera enregisters the beauty of nature in vivid colors.
